trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Reporting 'Unknown Actor' | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Reporting 'Unknown Actor' | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Description of the 'Unknown Actor' event in Azure Active Directory Reports
trans-unit.target: Description of the 'Unknown Actor' event in Azure Active Directory Reports

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Reporting 'Unknown Actor' event
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Reporting 'Unknown Actor' event

trans-unit.source: This documentation is part of the [Azure Active Directory Reporting Guide](active-directory-reporting-guide.md).
trans-unit.target: This documentation is part of the [Azure Active Directory Reporting Guide](active-directory-reporting-guide.md).

trans-unit.source: On rare occasions, you may see unusual values in the "Actor" or "User" fields in Azure AD Reports.
trans-unit.target: On rare occasions, you may see unusual values in the "Actor" or "User" fields in Azure AD Reports.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is expected, and is caused by one of two events:
trans-unit.target: This behavior is expected, and is caused by one of two events:

trans-unit.source: A Service Principal is acting on the directory, without a user context
trans-unit.target: A Service Principal is acting on the directory, without a user context

trans-unit.source: In this case, a Service Principal (Application) is performing directory updates without actually signing in as a user.
trans-unit.target: In this case, a Service Principal (Application) is performing directory updates without actually signing in as a user.

trans-unit.source: This causes the Service Principal's ID to show up as the Actor, instead of a UPN.
trans-unit.target: This causes the Service Principal's ID to show up as the Actor, instead of a UPN.

trans-unit.source: This is a known bug, and we are working diligently to resolve it.
trans-unit.target: This is a known bug, and we are working diligently to resolve it.

trans-unit.source: A user was deleted from the directory before the event was processed
trans-unit.target: A user was deleted from the directory before the event was processed

trans-unit.source: In this case, a user was deleted from the directory before we processed the event and associated a username with it.
trans-unit.target: In this case, a user was deleted from the directory before we processed the event and associated a username with it.

trans-unit.source: This is a known bug, and we are working diligently to resolve it.
trans-unit.target: This is a known bug, and we are working diligently to resolve it.
